title: AI Innovation Award
description: Received the AI Innovation Award at the 2024 Tech Summit Nigeria for developing the NEG AI Banking Platform, recognized for its secure digital wallet and real-time transaction capabilities using MongoDB and Flutterwave.

title: Lead Machine Learning Researcher
description: Led a team at Federal University of Technology, Akure (July 2023 – March 2024) to develop a Student Grade Prediction Model, achieving 92% accuracy in forecasting WASSCE performance, published in a peer-reviewed journal.

title: Outstanding ML Engineer Intern
description: Earned the Outstanding Intern Award at Chronicles Software Development Company (January 2023 – June 2023) for building an NLP-powered Chatbot Tutor, adopted by 500+ students for personalized learning.

title: Community Impact Leader
description: Served as CDS President for ICT, NYSC, Opudu LG (October 2024 – January 2025), implementing digital literacy programs that trained 200+ community members in software development and AI basics.

title: Open-Source Contributor
description: Contributed to TensorFlow’s open-source community (November 2023 – April 2024), enhancing NLP model performance with 10+ merged pull requests, improving sentiment analysis accuracy by 15%.

title: Machine Learning Educator
description: Organized and delivered free weekend workshops on Machine Learning and Neural Networks in Lagos (December 2023), impacting 300+ students and professionals, with 90% reporting improved understanding.
